# ğŸ³ DishDash

**Transform your fridge into a creative kitchen!** Enter your ingredients, set your constraints (time, preferences), and receive personalized recipes generated by Mistral AI. Save your recipes and cook without stress!

## âœ¨ Features

- **ğŸ¨ Blue & White Design** : Clean pastel color scheme
- **ğŸ” Simple Auth** : Username-only login
- **ğŸ¤– AI Recipes** : Generate 6 recipes with Mistral AI
- **ğŸ’¾ Save System** : Save/unsave recipes with real-time updates
- **ğŸ” Search** : Filter saved recipes
- **ğŸ“± Mobile** : Responsive design with hamburger menu

## ğŸš€ Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: Next.js 14 + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Python + FastAPI + SQLAlchemy
- **AI**: Mistral API integration
- **Database**: PostgreSQL

## ğŸ“¦ Quick Start

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone git@github.com:hugobrun343/DishDash.git
cd DishDash

# Start development environment
docker-compose up
```
